dropZoneText: DROP .ZIP, .RAR OR .7Z FILES HERE TO INSTALL
noLocalInfo: No local mod info file found.
modManagerDownloadsDesc: Set Singularity as the default application for (nxm://) links.
troubleshootModalDesc: This will DELETE the GCMODSETTINGS file, forcing the game to regenerate a new one on the next launch.
cleanStagingDesc: Cleans temporary folders left over by the installation process if they didn't get deleted automatically.
switchProfileMsg:
Switch profile to "{{profileName}}"?

This will purge current mods and install the profile's mods.
updateNoneFound: All mods are up to date!
selectFoldersDesc: This mod contains multiple folders. Please select which ones you want to install.
priorityModalDesc: Enter a new priority number between 0 and {{max}}.
untrackedModsMsg:
WARNING: Untracked Mods Detected!

You have mods installed in your folder that were not installed via this Manager.

These files are NOT tracked by the Profile system. If you switch profiles, these files might be deleted or cause conflicts.

To fix this, delete them from the folder and reinstall them by dragging their .zip files into the Manager.
resetWarningMsg: Hidden warnings have been reset and will appear again if issues are detected.
confirmDeleteMod: Are you sure you want to permanently delete the mod '{{modName}}'? This will delete its folder from the MODS directory and cannot be undone.
modConflictMsg:
A mod with this ID is already installed ('{{oldName}}').

Replace it with '{{newName}}'?
modUpdateConflictMsg: A mod with this ID is already installed ('{{oldName}}'). Replace it with '{{newName}}'?
deleteDownloadArchiveMsg:
Are you sure you want to delete this downloaded mod archive?

This cannot be undone.
deleteAllDownloadsMsg:
Are you sure you want to delete ALL downloaded mod archives?

This will remove the files from your computer and cannot be undone.
removeNXMHandlerMsg:
Singularity is currently the default handler for NXM links.
Do you want to remove this association?
addNXMHandlerMsg: Do you want to set Singularity as the default application for 'Mod Manager Download' (nxm://) links?
disconnectNexusAccMsg: Are you sure you want to disconnect your Nexus Mods account?
invalidPriorityMsg: Invalid priority. Please enter a number between 0 and {{max}}.
errorNoRemoteDb: Could not fetch remote mod database. Please check your internet connection.
alertExtractSuccess: Successfully installed mod(s) from '{{fileName}}' to the MODS folder.
alertDeleteNotFound: GCMODSETTINGS.MXML was not found (it may have already been deleted).
alertDeleteError: Could not find game path. File was not deleted.
promptForNexusLink: The mod '{{modName}}' is not linked to Nexus Mods for update check. To link it, please paste the full Nexus Mods URL for this mod below:
linkCancelled: Linking for '{{modName}}' was cancelled. You can check for updates manually.
linkSuccess: Successfully linked '{{modName}}'! Update checking is now enabled.
linkInvalid: The URL you provided for '{{modName}}' does not appear to be a valid No Man's Sky Nexus Mods link.
